strings.name: OpenStreetMap Colorado
strings.description: Mappers and OpenStreetMap users in the state of Colorado, USA
strings.extendedDescription: OpenStreetMap (OSM) Colorado is a local collaboration of people interested in contributing their efforts to create free maps. We encourage all of our mappers to organize or suggest mapping events throughout the state. Meetup activities can be simple social mixers, OSM basic to advanced training, or community mapping parties.

strings.description: We help grow and improve OpenStreetMap in the United States.
strings.extendedDescription: We support OpenStreetMap by holding annual conferences, providing community resources, building partnerships, and by spreading the word. Join OpenStreetMap US here: {signupUrl}

events.name: Mapping USA 2022
events.description: Join us for a free virtual conference in celebration of the Wiki and OpenStreetMap communities across North America!

strings.name: OpenStreetMap Utah
strings.description: Mappers and OpenStreetMap users in the Salt Lake City area
strings.extendedDescription: Activities may include things like Learn To Map workshops, mapping parties and outdoor data collection. The events will take place in the SLC area, at least initially.  We are looking for seasoned mappers as well as people new to OSM. Join and let's do some mapping!
